article_title: Mediators push for Gaza ceasefire but gaps remain
sentence: However,  one  thing  that  Israel  and  its  Western  allies  are  unlikely  to  compromise  on  is  that  Hamas  leaders  must  be  removed  from  power  in  Gaza,  to  ensure  that  there  can  be  no  repeat  of  the  attacks  three  months  ago,  which  killed  about  1,200  people.

article_title: Mediators push for Gaza ceasefire but gaps remain
sentence: With  more  than  25,000  people  now  killed  in  Gaza,  according  to  local  health  officials,  and  a  catastrophic  humanitarian  situation,  international  calls  for  a  ceasefire  have  become  much  harder  for  Israel  to  ignore.

article_title: Mediators push for Gaza ceasefire but gaps remain
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.

article_title: Mediators push for Gaza ceasefire but gaps remain
sentence: This  was  based  on  counting  those  who  later  died  from  their  injuries  in  addition  to  the  figure  of  more  than  1,200.
